ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Calculates the normalized mutual information (NMI) of two community structures in network analysis.
Calculates the normalized mutual information (NMI) of two community structures in network analysis.

name: r-nmi
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '2.0' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-nmi
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/NMI_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/NMI/NMI_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: c39fd733944601dd314dc37a4b0332d374236aa2bb21f263833f79989387b7e7

build:
  number: 4
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('NMI')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('NMI')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=NMI
  license: GPL-2.0-only
  summary: Calculates the normalized mutual information (NMI) of two community structures in
    network analysis.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: NMI
# Title: Normalized Mutual Information of Community Structure in Network
# Version: 2.0
# Authors@R: person("Tianhao", "Wu", email = "tianhao.wu@yale.edu", role = c("aut", "cre"))
# Description: Calculates the normalized mutual information (NMI) of two community structures in network analysis.
# Depends: R (>= 3.2.2)
# License: GNU General Public License version 2
# Encoding: UTF-8
# LazyData: true
# RoxygenNote: 5.0.1
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2016-08-20 10:54:43 UTC; tianhaowu
# Author: Tianhao Wu [aut, cre]
# Maintainer: Tianhao Wu <tianhao.wu@yale.edu>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2016-08-20 15:36:57
